resources.string: This App demonstrates the use of the following components:

This Column contains a lot of symbols to demonstrate the scroll view container. The extended text that goes past a normal mobile phone display is able to scroll view additional text in order to have larger content sites.

This Column also contains a lot of symbols to demonstrate the scroll view container. The extended text that goes past a normal mobile phone display is able to scroll view additional text in order to have larger content sites.

Container: Scroll View 
 Layout: Linear Layout 
 Widgets: Plain text View 
 Text field: Plain text
